DOCU_Docu.DOC:
About the Package ============================== Office 365 is a line of subscription services offered by Microsoft as part of the Microsoft Office product line. The brand encompasses plans that allow use of the Microsoft Office software suite over the life of the subscription, as well as cloud-based software as a service products for business environments, such as hosted Exchange Server, Skype for Business Server, and SharePoint, among others. All Office 365 plans include automatic updates to their respective software at no additional charge, as opposed to conventional licenses for these programs where new versions require purchase of a new license.
This action pack allows to run the action in only one mode. * WIN Agent
=Variables= (None)
=Common Inputs= -- Office365 connection Details -- - URL Provide the Office365 connection URL. - Username Provide Username to authenticate. - Password Provide Password to authenticate.
-- Agent/Login -- - Overwrite Agent Overwrites the default agent - Overwrite Login Overwrites the default login
=Actions= The following actions are supported.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.ADD_MEMBER_TO_GROUP * Action Description : This action adds the members to the group.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.ADD_PERMISSIONS_SHARED_MAILBOX * Action Description : This action adds single or multiple permissions on a shared mailbox in Microsoft Exchange.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_GROUP * Action Description : This action creates a new group.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_MAILBOX * Action Description : This action creates a new mailbox in Microsoft Exchange.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.CREATE_SHARED_MAILBOX * Action Description : This action creates a new shared mailbox in Microsoft Exchange.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.DELETE_GROUP * Action Description : This action deletes the group.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.DELETE_MAILBOX * Action Description : This action deletes a mailbox or a shared mailbox.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.DELETE_MEMBER_FROM_GROUP * Action Description : This action deletes the members from the group
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.REMOVE_PERMISSIONS_SHARED_MAILBOX * Action Description : This action removes single or multiple permissions on a shared mailbox in Microsoft Exchange.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.UPDATE_GROUP * Action Description : This action updates a group.
* Action name : PCK.AUTOMIC_MICROSOFT_OFFICE365.PUB.ACTION.UPDATE_MAILBOX * Action Description : This Action updates a mailbox or shared mailbox.
